amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that special attention should be paid to the welfare of ChaldoAssyrians and other indigenous Christians in Iraq.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 32 printed in part B of House Report 109-175 to express the sense of Congress that special attention should be paid to the welfare of ChaldoAssyrians and other indigenous Christians in Iraq.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Eshoo amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.
